children.text: See how our customers use LogRocket to ship better digital experiences.

components.title: Read our customer stories.
components.subTitle: Learn how over 3,000 customers use LogRocket to answer product questions, identify user issues, and deliver better apps and experiences

quote.listingTitle: Delivering better user experiences with data

children.text: “By hand-delivering the highest-impact issues and their causes, LogRocket Galileo allows us to make the most of limited time and resources.”
Delivering better user experiences with data
Cox Automotive's Manheim division uses LogRocket to deliver a better user experience and build confidence in its products.

quote.name: Chuck Konfrst

quotes.listingTitle: Raising the bar for customer experience

children.text: "LogRocket saves so much time."

quotes.name: David Grumm

children.text: “When I need to answer a question from leadership, I can get the answers I need in 5 or 10 minutes.”
Improved onboarding for increased retention
Myndshft uses LogRocket to equip its teams with the tools they need to ensure successful new customer onboarding and improve retention.
"LogRocket Galileo is like having another person working for you."
"LogRocket is a tool that brings teams together"
"LogRocket has data we can't get anywhere else."
"Every time an improvement is requested, we use LogRocket to demonstrate and justify the change."
3x increase in conversion
Siigo uses LogRocket to optimize conversion rates and drive their business forward.
"LogRocket is an empathy building tool between Prefect and our customers."

quotes.listingTitle: Accelerated releases and improved app performance

children.text: "We get a clear idea of what's going on from an end-user standpoint."

quotes.name: Vinay Madugula
quotes.team: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts

children.text: “LogRocket helped us hone in on a conversion step in our funnel where we had the biggest opportunity to improve”
Solving more issues faster

Cushman & Wakefield is using LogRocket to turn real estate into a technology-first business. With LogRocket’s unobstructed UX visibility, the Cushman team pinpoints issue sources in less than 10 minutes.

quotes.designation: VP of Architecture and Application Development
quotes.name: Alan Murray

children.text: “LogRocket really helped us understand issues that otherwise would take us much longer.”
Reduction in mean time to resolution
Tipalti turned to LogRocket to eliminate the back and forth between its support and engineering teams and shift to a proactive approach to issue identification and resolution.
“LogRocket is so integrated into how we solve our problems, I don’t know what we would do without it.”

quotes.listingTitle: Delivering greater customer value in every release

children.text: “It’s easy for us to see if something is broken and if we need to take action.”
Delivering greater customer value in every release
LogRocket gives Dojo a real-time picture of customer experience that helps resolve customer service issues and provides complete visibility into how customers are using the product.

quotes.name: Marco Lanaro

children.text: “I go into LogRocket and see what customers want, what they need, and what will actually get us more customers.”
Data-driven issue prioritization process

ProfitWell combines the deep product data provided by MixPanel with the qualitative and technical data offered by LogRocket for a complete picture of user behavior. See how LogRocket insights helped a ProfitWell project manager master issue and feature priorization
"LogRocket helps us identify customer sticking points and what's making them have a bad experience."

quotes.listingTitle: Faster performance and increased Google Lighthouse scores

children.text: "Thanks to LogRocket, we not only have the aggregated information that the performance is getting worse, but why it’s getting worse."
Faster performance and increased Google Lighthouse scores
Rappi has made LogRocket their single source of truth for identifying and resolving performance issues that affect the user experience.

quotes.name: Enrique Ulloa

children.text: "Before, we might know if something was wrong, but where was it? You see a few LogRocket sessions, and all of a sudden you've got it."
Improved conversion & better fraud prevention
Tower Loan uses LogRocket to streamline the loan application process and weed out attempted fraud.
“We chose LogRocket to capture product insights and understand common support areas.”
Faster support ticket resolution
Cannabis technology platform Dutchie uses LogRocket to create shared experiences between its customers and its support, product and engineering teams.
“With LogRocket, we know all the bugs we have."
80% fewer bugs per month
Htech implemented LogRocket to deliver a clear picture of the actions users took, why they took them, and what errors prevented them from achieving their goals.
